import React from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' export default class User extends React.Component { state = { questions: 10, category: "9", difficulty: "Medium" } handleFormChange(event) { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) console.log(this.state) } handleLoadTest(event) { event.preventDefault() const testURL = `https://opentdb.com/api.php?amount=${this.state.questions}&category=${this.state.category}&difficulty=${this.state.difficulty}&type=multiple` } render() { return ( <>

Select Parameters for Test

Number of Questions this.handleFormChange(event)} name='questions' value={this.state.questions} as='select' custom> Test Category this.handleFormChange(event)} name='category' value={this.state.category} as='select' custom> Question Difficulty this.handleFormChange(event)} name='difficulty' value={this.state.difficulty} as='select' custom>
) } }
